Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28182 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.29.6-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28182 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.29.6-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.29.6-1, affected by CVE-2024-28182
